page.title: 09THE FARNHAM ROAD, SLOUGH
page.content:
The Farnham Road is the most important shopping area for the western half of Slough,outside the town centre. It is also used by the workers on the nearby Trading Estate.
The hours 8.0-9.0, 12.0-2.0 and 4.0-6.0 are rush hours on the Farnham Road, causing traffic jams and problems to workers, local residents and shoppers.
It is hard to park a car when shopping because there are not enough parking spaces, then people get angry because they can't park on yellow lines and they have to look out for traffic wardens in case they get fined for illegal parking. The house owners get annoyed because cars are sometimes left in front of their houses and then they can't put their own cars there.
